2.name: CHAPTER 1. - THE DEPARTMENT OF COMMUNITY SERVICES
2.label: chapter

full_text:
(a) The staff shall be a unit in the Community Services Department.(b) The staff shall coordinate their activities consistent with the policies and practices of the City.(c) The Office of Civil Rights is responsible to the director of Community Services Department.
(Ord. No. 1977-473, 3-1-577, §3)

2.name: CHAPTER 1. - THE DEPARTMENT OF COMMUNITY SERVICES
2.label: chapter

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

STAFF. (§ 4-1012)

(a) The staff shall be a unit in the Community Services Department.

(b) The staff shall coordinate their activities consistent with the policies and
practices of the City.

(c) The Office of Civil Rights is responsible to the director of Community
Services Department.
(Ord. No. 1977-473, 3-1-577, §3)
